attributes.action: Tax plastic carrier bags in supermarkets and stores to cut waste and encourage shoppers to bring their own bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a charge of 10c was introduced in Ireland, the number of bags used dropped by 90%.  Most bags are only used once and then binned.  They create litter and are a waste of energy in their manufacture and disposal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
